de.futjikato.stroiz.network

Class TcpPacket

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.futjikato.stroiz.network.TcpPacket

  • public class TcpPacket
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of a TCP packet. A packet consists of the following information: - It's byte size - Length of the action name byte representation - Byte representation of action name - Amount of parameter - For each parameter : Length of parameter byte representation - For each parameter : Parameter byte representation
